title: Friends who attended anime convention with man who contracted omicron have tested positive for coronavirus, health official says
content:
1. Friends who attended anime convention with man who contracted omicron have tested positive for coronavirus, health official says  The Washington Post
  2. Omicron variant of COVID-19 found in multiple US states  Fox News
  3. Hawaii health officials testing 3 more specimens for possible omicron variant  Honolulu Star-Advertiser
  4. Coronavirus Briefing: What Happened Today  The New York Times
  5. Editorial: Omicron is here, just in time for the holidays. But don't panic.  Houston Chronicle
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: オミクロンに感染した男性と一緒にアニメ大会に参加した友人が、コロナウイルスの陽性反応を示したと厚生労働省が発表。
卫生官员说，与感染欧米茄的男子一起参加动漫大会的朋友对冠状病毒检测呈阳性。
衛生官員說，與感染歐米茄的男子一起參加動漫大會的朋友對冠狀病毒檢測呈陽性。
